mapper.select: SELECT msa.staff_id as staffId, mbsi.employeeName as staffName, mea.affair_id as affairId, mea.affair_name as afairName, mea.series as series, mea.system as system, mea.bu as bu FROM mms_staff_affair msa, mms_examination_affair mea, mms_base_staff_info mbsi WHERE msa.staff_id = mbsi.employeeId AND mea.affair_id = msa.affair_id AND msa.is_solved = 0 and msa.evaluator_id = #{evaluatorId}

SELECT med.dimension_id as dimensionId, med.dimension_name as dimensionName, med.mark as mark FROM mms_examination_dimension med, mms_affair_dimension mad WHERE med.dimension_id = mad.dimension_id AND mad.affair_id = #{affairId}

SELECT itemId, itemName FROM mms_examination_rule_item WHERE ruleId = ( SELECT b.ruleId FROM ( SELECT mpsi.staff_id, mbsi.employeeName, mpsi.po_role_id role, mbsi.bu, mbsi.rank FROM mms_base_staff_info mbsi, mms_po_staff_info mpsi WHERE employeeID = mpsi.staff_id AND employeeID = #{staffId} ) a INNER JOIN ( SELECT mer.*, msr.roleName, mbsi.bu FROM mms_examination_rule mer, mms_base_staff_info mbsi, mms_special_role msr WHERE mbsi.employeeID = mer.creatorId AND mer.roleId = msr.roleId ) b WHERE a.role = b.roleName AND a.bu = b.bu AND a.rank = b.roleLevel ) AND itemType = 1
update mms_staff_affair set is_solved = 1 where staff_id = #{staffId} and affair_id = #{affairId}

SELECT a.affairId, a.affairName, a.evaluatorId, a.affairId, a.affairName, a.series, a.du, b.sumScore, b.dimensionId, b.dimensionName, b.score, b.evaluation FROM ( SELECT msa.staff_id AS staffId, mbsi.employeeName AS staffName, msa.evaluator_id evaluatorId, mea.affair_id AS affairId, mea.affair_name AS affairName, mea.series AS series, mea.system AS system, mbsi.du AS du FROM mms_staff_affair msa, mms_examination_affair mea, mms_base_staff_info mbsi WHERE msa.staff_id = mbsi.employeeId AND mea.affair_id = msa.affair_id AND msa.is_solved = 1 ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT temp.*, med.dimension_name dimensionName FROM ( SELECT a.employee_id employeeId, a.affair_id affairId, a.sumScore, a.changeTime, mtds.dimension_id dimensionId, mtds.score, mtds.evaluation FROM ( SELECT mtds.employee_id, mtds.affair_id, SUM(mtds.score) sumScore, MAX(mtds.change_time) changeTime FROM mms_transaction_dimension_score mtds, mms_examination_dimension med WHERE mtds.dimension_id = med.dimension_id GROUP BY mtds.employee_id, mtds.affair_id ) a LEFT JOIN mms_transaction_dimension_score mtds ON a.affair_id = mtds.affair_id AND a.employee_id = mtds.employee_id ) temp LEFT JOIN mms_examination_dimension med ON temp.dimensionId = med.dimension_id ) b ON a.staffId = b.employeeId where a.evaluatorId = #{evaluatorId}
